transcript:
Hello.
Hello, good morning, ma'am.
Han, good morning, sir. Bataye.
Right, IndiaMART se bhi aapne Sunil baat kar raha hu. Aapke bhi Friday ke din discussion hua tha na aapke sath?
Achcha achcha, okay.
Han ji, to maine connect kiya tha actually isme na aap
ka, han ji, kya keh rahe ho?
Batao batao sir aap batao.
Aapki side se na Friday ko call aaya tha but maybe main meeting vagaira mein tha to wo miss call chala gaya. So abhi mere paas wo reminder aa raha tha ki aapki side se miss call tha na to maine connect back kiya. Aapki Neha ke sath meeting vagaira ho gayi ma'am?
Han, Neha ke sath to meeting hui hai ma'am ke sath.
Okay, okay. To unhone aapko cheeze explain kar di. Usme kuch doubt concern to nahi de raha abhi aapko service uses ke baat dekha jaye to?
Nahi nahi, abhi to nahi hai.
Thik hai aur baki cheeze agar aap thoda sa jaise jaise service ko utilize karenge na to aapko cheeze dekhne ko milegi aapko experience hoga agar kuch still koi bhi doubt concern by lead ko leke service ko leke rehta hai na aap directly Neha ka number aapke paas hoga also aap mere number pe mera jo number hai personal number wala aap us pe bhi call back kar sakte ho agar IndiaMART se leke koi bhi dikkat hota hai to.
Han, okay sir, thik hai. Baki wahi mahoday weekly kitni batai thi?
Ah, by lead na?
Han han.
Aapko MDC service jo current plan chal raha hai isme 17 by lead total milega aapko weekly basis pe jisme weekly lapsable 10 by lead hoga. Daily lapsable one by lead hoga. Matlab aap daily basis pe kabhi do ya kabhi teen by lead consume kar sakte ho apne ko agar average pure week mein by lead equally use karna hai to kabhi do aur kabhi teen by lead aap consume kar sakte hain.
Ah, week mein 10 hai?
Han, weekly lapsable matlab kya hota hai na ki Sunday ko ya Sunday ko 12:01 minute ke raat mein 12:01 pe aapko by lead allocate hoga.
Thik hai wo aapke next Sunday ke evening tak 11:59 tak wo validate hoga.
11:59 tak validate hoga matlab wo pure week tak aapka lapse nahi karega aap us 10 balance ko pure week mein kisi bhi din use kar sakte ho. Thik hai aur ek hota hai daily matlab ki aaj agar aapko morning mein 12 one pe agar aapko ek by lead ka balance allocate hua wo aaj evening mein 11:59 pe lapse hoga to aapka daily wala ek balance aur weekly wala 10 balance agar total hum week ke hisab se calculate karenge to 17 balance hoga aap agar che din working lete ho divided by six karte ho to hum average le sakte hain ki daily basis pe do ya teen by lead hum use kare taki daily wala ek balance use ho jayega aur weekly wale balance mein se ek do by lead aapka use hota rahega daily basis pe.
Thik hai thik hai.
Thik hai aur dusri cheez hai na aap dekh bhi sakte ho by lead ka balance aap apne system mein check bhi kar sakte ho ki abhi tak mere paas balance kitna pada hai maine kitna use kiya hai aur yes yes wo bhi bata deta hu aapke samne system mein login hoga na abhi IndiaMART?
Han ji han ji.
Aap by lead section mein jaiye left side ke row ke andar dekhiye by lead karke likha waha pe jaiye. Right side mein sabse niche dekhiye ma'am ek option hoga balance karke likha aa raha hoga.
Right side mein corner mein niche dekhiye ma'am.
Ab balance pe click karenge to aapko do bar click karenge to India by lead daily basis one by one likha hoga weekly basis 10 by 10 likha hoga agar aapne usme se use kiya ho to wo usme se kam ho jayega man lo se one by 10 hoga ya fir zero by one hoga ya one by one aise karke dikha hoga.
Isme likha daily bonus one by one weekly 10 to 10 by 10 to it means ki use hua hai ki nahi hua hai?
Nahi hua hai nahi hua hai kyuki aaj kya hai Monday hai to aapko kal hi aaj ki is morning mein hi sara lead allocate hua hai daily wala bhi aapka balance pada hua hai weekly wala bhi balance pada hai niche dekhna date likha aa raha hoga weekly ke niche likha expire on Saturday 29 November.
Han han.
Han na to ye jo weekly balance hai 10 balance ye expire hoga Saturday ki 29th ko expire hoga 29th tak hum is weekly balance ko use kar sakte hain kabhi aap isme se do le sakte hain kabhi teen kabhi ek wo aap pe depend karta hai ki aap weekly balance mein se kitna use karte ho aur daily balance aapko one by one milta hai jaise hi aapne suppose aaj ke din se ek balance use kiya wo daily mein se use hoga jaise hi aap dusra by lead use karenge wo aapka weekly balance mein se use hoga.
Achcha iska matlab ho jayega na matlab minus ho jayega dikh jayega matlab scene ho jayega use ho gaya.
Exactly aap balance pe click karenge to daily basis wale pe agar aapne lead jaise hi consume kiya to zero by one ho jayega aur man lo weekly wale mein se use kiya to aapko 9 by 10 ya 8 by 10 aise karke dikhayega.
Okay thik hai okay sir okay sir to aap yaha se wo cheeze aapko rahega mind mein ki abhi apne paas balance kitna bacha hua hai uske according aap use kar sakte hain.
Okay sir okay sir. Is still agar kuch bhi apne ko doubt rehta hai na aapke paas mera number hai hi aap mere ko connect back kar lijiye baki jo aapke website ko leke discussion hua tha uske regarding aapke company director ya jo bhi decision person hai uske sath baat hua aapke wapas se?
Abhi sir aaye nahi hua out of station mein hai wo aate aate main baad discuss karti hu available nahi hai na.
Okay okay no issue ma'am baki hum log na aap is cheez ko mind mein rakhiye ki hum ek service person hai aapke sath jo bhi discussion kar rahe hain wo puri tarah se aapke behalf mein karenge ki aapka business segment kya hai aur hum log cheez suggest karenge ki aapko IndiaMART ke kis service mein hum aapke expectation ke hisab se results la ke de sakte hain to aap us cheez ke liye don't fikar rahiyega ki kahin na kahin samne wala kya bata raha hai kya uska results milega nahi milega aisa kuch nahi hoga hame payment ya sale se koi lena dena nahi hota hum client ka business dekhte hain ki aapko kis tarike se kam karna hai hamari IndiaMART ki jo hierarchy hoti hai services ki usme aapki konsi best suitable best hai uske hisab se suggest kar dena baki final decision aapka hi rehta hai agar kuch bhi doubt concern aayega aapko proper tarike se return mail pe dekhna.
Okay okay thik hai sir thik hai karti hu sir contact.
Thik hai aur aapke paas abhi call disconnect hone ke baad ek mail pe feedback aayega ma'am so please agar aapko mere sath baat karke achcha laga to aap positive feedback dijiyega.
Han sir.
Thank you ma'am.
Thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know about weekly by lead details.

- Wants to know how to check by lead balance.



Resolution:

- Explained weekly and daily by lead details.

- Explained how to check by lead balance.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- byleads, subscription, balance check, weekly, daily
